metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6052 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The HandleRFBServerMessage function in libvncclient/rfbproto.c inLibVNCServer 0.9.9 and earlier does not check certain malloc return values,which allows remote VNC servers to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) or possibly execute arbitrary code by specifying a large screen sizein a (1) FramebufferUpdate, (2) ResizeFrameBuffer, or (3)PalmVNCReSizeFrameBuffer message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

italc-client - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-management-console - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-master - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
libitalccore - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: italc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1').
